attributes.action: Make UK Crypto Profits Tax Free, as long as it is not a form of main income.
attributes.additional_details: If the money you put into crypto has already been taxed from your main income wage i believe the money you profit from it should also be tax free, unless You are using Cryptocurrency as a form of main Income, then i believe it should be taxed as per usual. People are using their hard earned money from work in crypto to better their networth and i believe it should be highly encouraged and can have a great impact on the UK.
attributes.background: Allow Crypto income to be tax free as long as it is not your Full time Income Wage. If you make Crypto Profits as a side income and not as your main Income, Allow it to be tax free. If the money you put into crypto has already been taxed, then the money you make from it should not be taxed.
